Exit/Entry delays define the grace perio: Exit/Entry delays define the grace period when arming or entering. Pre-alarm is an intermediate warning before the full alarm, and alarm duration controls how long the full alarm stays active.
Baseline snapshot tolerates sensors that: Baseline snapshot tolerates sensors that are already open when arming (e.g. tilted windows) by treating them as the reference state.
Block arming stops arming when any senso: Block arming stops arming when any sensor is open. Auto-bypass allows arming but automatically bypasses currently open sensors.
